float Math::get_random_snd (  float    avg,
float    sd,
bool    returnNonNegative = false
) 
 

returns a random value in standard normal distribution with average avg and standard deviation sd write code here according to the book "Numerical Receipe in C"

nonNegative: trancate the return value to zero or positive value; default=false;
